action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X X ▢ X X
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
X X ▢ X X
X X ▢ X X

DESCRIPTION: My grid is a 5x5 square. The first and last rows are identical, with an X in the first, second, fourth, and fifth positions, and an empty square (▢) in the third position. The second and fourth rows are also identical, with an X in the first and fifth positions, and empty squares in the second, third, and fourth positions. The middle row, the third row, is composed entirely of empty squares.
continue
